file_content.text: You have made your choice. I can give you nothing more.
Do not be surprised. The Sith do sometimes, grudgingly, allow aliens into their ranks. You may even learn something from me. Two paths are open:
The Marauder brings death and destruction. Wearing lighter armor and striking with two lightsabers, Marauders master the deadly Juyo form, the acrobatic Ataru form, or the balanced Shii-Cho form.
The Juggernaut dons heavy armor and a shield generator to empower their attacks and defense. A Juggernauts learns the deadly Shien form, the balanced Shii-Cho form, or the resilient Soresu form.
Once your decision is made, your fate is decided. There is no turning back. Now decide!
I wish to be a Sith Marauder.
Then let none stand in your path.
I will be a Sith Juggernaut.
I have no time for you.
